member.summary: Constructor for a catalog named in directory using the cryptographic parameters and key collection .
member.param: Create a new persistence store on disk if it does not already exist.
Attempt to decrypt the contents of the catalog if encrypted.
The directory in which the catalog persistence container is stored.
The catalog persistence container file name.
The default cryptographic enhancements to be applied to container entries.
The cryptographic policy to be applied to the container.
The key collection to be used to resolve keys when reading entries.
The bitmask to identify the store for filtering purposes.

member.name: T:Goedel.Palimpsest.Forum
member.summary: The class tracking the status of a forum, all interactions with the forum take place through this lens

member.summary: Factory method returning a newly created forum instance

member.name: M:Goedel.Palimpsest.Forum.Load(System.String)
member.summary: Factory method returning a forum instance for the specified directory.

member.name: M:Goedel.Palimpsest.Forum.CreateProject(Goedel.Palimpsest.ProjectHandle)
member.summary: Create a project within the forum
member.param: The project to be created.
member.exception: The project could not be created because it already exists

member.name: M:Goedel.Palimpsest.Forum.TryGetProject(System.String,Goedel.Palimpsest.ProjectHandle@)
member.summary: Gets the project associated with the specified key.
member.param: The key of the value to get.
When this method returns, contains the project identified by the specified key, if the key is found; otherwise, null. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
member.returns: true if there is a project identified by specified key; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Goedel.Palimpsest.Forum.CreateMember(Goedel.Palimpsest.MemberHandle)
member.summary: Create a member with authorizations related to the forum
member.param: The member to be created.
member.exception: The member could not be created because it already exists

member.name: M:Goedel.Palimpsest.Forum.TryGetMember(System.String,Goedel.Palimpsest.MemberHandle@)
member.summary: Gets the member associated with the specified key.
member.param: The key of the value to get.
When this method returns, contains the member identified by the specified key, if the key is found; otherwise, null. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
member.returns: true if there is a member identified by specified key; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Goedel.Palimpsest.Forum.TryGetReource(System.String,Goedel.Palimpsest.ResourceHandle@)
member.summary: Gets the resource associated with the specified key.
member.param: The key of the value to get.
When this method returns, contains the resource identified by the specified key, if the key is found; otherwise, null. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
member.returns: true if there is a resource identified by specified key; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Goedel.Palimpsest.Forum.TryGetReaction(System.String,Goedel.Palimpsest.ReactionHandle@)
member.summary: Gets the reaction associated with the specified key.
member.param: The key of the value to get.
When this method returns, contains the reaction identified by the specified key, if the key is found; otherwise, null. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
member.returns: true if there is a reaction identified by specified key; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Goedel.Palimpsest.Cache`1.Add(`0)
member.summary: Add the item to the cache.

member.name: M:Goedel.Palimpsest.Cache`1.Remove(`0)
member.summary: Mark the item for removal from the cache. Note that this is only advisory, the cache may keep the item in memory until it determines memory usage needs to be reduced.
member.param: The value to mark for removal.
member.exception: The item does not exist in the cache
